title: R3d log
body: I have been having some trouble with getting the R3d logs on my new macbook. I know I can find the logs here (Applications/League of Legends/Contents/LOL/Logs/Game - R3d Logs) but I don't know how to get there. Some help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: thank you very much when i went onto the support site it said what i was looking for but not how to get to it.

Hello Rageosaurusrex!

There are two different ways you can actually get to this location while on a Mac:

**With Mouse**:  Right click the LoL application icon in the application folder and select "show package contents"

**Without Mouse/Just trackpad**:  Command-click the LoL application icon in the application folder

Hope this helps!  Remember, there will not be any files there unless games have been played.  Give me a reply if your still not able to get these logs!
